publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-897 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees the following revision to the programme of business for Thursday 12 February 2004- after, 9.30 am Procedures Committee Debate on its 2nd Report 2003 (Session 2): Oral Questions in the Chamber; on its 1st Report 2004: Oral Questions and Time in the Chamber; and on its 2nd Report 2004: Emergency Bills insert, followed by Motion on Asylum and Immigration (Treatment of Claimants, etc.) Bill - UK Legislation and after, 3.10 pm Stage 3 of the Budget (Scotland) Bill delete, followed by Motion on Asylum and Immigration (Treatment of Claimants, etc.) Bill - UK Legislation Supported by: Tavish Scott*
